name: Tuning game
description:
This game is part of a publishing project of Contredanse about the US choreographer Lisa Nelson and her dance practice.

It is a virtual version of tuning scores, an improvisation technique Lisa has built over the years, involving two dancers around a table, researching and structuring their performance on stage following a simple set of rules called "calls".

This is a WIP of the application to be released in 2020.

You can follow development of the project here: https://gitlab.com/polymorphcool/tuning_game
